meanings.definition: 実現された、具現化された、達成された

examples.japanese_translation: そのプロジェクトは成功裏に実現された。
彼女のビジョンはついに実現した。

meanings.usage_notes: 'Verwirklicht' is the past participle of the verb 'verwirklichen'. It is used to describe something that has been brought into reality or has been achieved. It can be used as an adjective or as part of a perfect tense verb construction.
meanings.grammar_notes: Used as an adjective or part of a perfect tense verb. Agrees in gender, number, and case with the noun it modifies when used as an adjective.
